definitions.definition: To stay or remain in a place or situation, especially as if unwilling to depart or not easily able to do so.
To remain alive or existent although still proceeding toward death or extinction ; to die gradually .
To consider or contemplate for a period of time; to engage in analytic thinking or discussion .
definitions.label_groups: intransitive , idiomatic , often followed by on

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To stay or remain in a place or situation, especially as if unwilling to depart or not easily able to do so.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To remain alive or existent although still proceeding toward death or extinction ; to die gradually .
( intransitive , idiomatic , often followed by on ) To consider or contemplate for a period of time; to engage in analytic thinking or discussion .
